name: Dirac Sea
description:
“We live on a placid island of ignorance in the midst of black seas of infinity, and it was not meant that we should voyage far.” - H. P. Lovecraft, The Call of Cthulhu Story

You are an explorer trying to conduct research on the physical anomaly known as the Dirac Sea and the pocket dimension that lurks beneath. In this pocket dimension You have discovered the corpse of the lost city of r’lyeh. You must navigate through the lost city, past the puzzles and traps to find the Eye of the Storm. Escape into the horizon without being swallowed into the Dirac Sea...

Gameplay Control a Sphere robot and transform with dual movement modes.

Walk up and down slopes and push boulders to find your path

OR

Roll around with extreme speed and knock your way past the traps with your ForceField.

Orbital Traps

These merry-go-rounds of death resemble electrons and are ready to knock you back (literally) into oblivion. Simply activate Rolling mode and your ForceField will be able to destroy these traps with ease.

Some Orbitals have light and act as Beacon Checkpoints. You will now be able to draw yourself back to these Beacons through the warped fabric of time and space should you ever get lost or destroyed.

MAGES Institute of Excellence

Dirac Sea was developed over a 6 week period by DGT Student Ian Ngoh as part of the Algorithms, Mathematics and Physics Module.

Asset Credits: 

Robot Sphere - Razgrizzz Demon
